cafe

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.OrderController

  • public class OrderController
extends java.lang.Object
    The OrderController class takes care of the OrderView.fxml . The OrderView allows user to see their order as well as remove their order. The OrderView also displays the subTotal, salesTax and the total price of the order
    Author:
    Prachiti Atigre, Ujani Patel

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method creates an observableList to store the orders and calculate the total amount of the order

      • placeOrder

        void placeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method places the order of the user. The method calls the MainMenuController to get the order and adds the order to the StoreOrders.
        Parameters:
        event - upon hitting the placeOrder button

      • printSalesTax

        public void printSalesTax()
        Prints the order sales tax in the appropriate text area
